Question.Subject: question about lockerz?
Question.Content: has anyone got the ipod touch 8 gb from lockerz yet? im saving up for it and i wanted to know what generation it is. Also, does it come with the built in wifi? and has anyone ordered one and not recieved it?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Just so you know its very hard to get a prize from Lockerz. They only have a redemption about once a month that lasts for 30min. And you have no clue when itll happen.
And just a suggestion- Look into signing up at swagbucks. You can can earn points to buy amazon gift cards and buy the ipod touch through amazon. Itll be much easier. http://www.swagbucks.com/refer/Rundee

Answer.Content:
Just so you know its very hard to get a prize from Lockerz. They only have a redemption about once a month that lasts for 30min. And you have no clue when itll happen.
